name: Carbage
storyline:
The world is rubble. Most people are gone.

And the ones still around apparently decided that the best thing to do - is to ride. Ride their silly cars like there's no tomorrow (because there probably isn't).
summary: Carbage is a cute and easy-going, no-threshold, bumper car party for everyone. It's perfectly simple for children or inexperienced players, and offers some ridiculous stunts to master among mature gamers. Play on your couch, with your friends and family. Don't forget snacks.
